title: Distant View of the Volcanos Tolima and Ruiz from the Vicinity of Tequendama Falls, Colombia
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on olive paper
description: Horizontal view of the banks of a steep valley with a stream shown in the foreground.  Ridges and peaks are in the middle distance.  The range from which the snow capped peaks rise is in the background.
name: Drawing
